body.p:
STATE OF KENTUCKY.
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL
OFFICE QUARTER-MASTER GENERAL,
Frankfort, , 187

A Copy
Washington City
War Department
May 19t 1864
Thos. E Bramlette
Gov. of Ky.

Sir -- I am instructed by the Secretary of War to a knowledge the receipt of Your Excellencys communication of the 28t inst. asking if any arrangements can be made for the payment ofby the United States of the 68t Enrolled Militia of Kentucky called out in April last. by Col Gallup Commanding the District of East Kentucky for the purpose of protecting his depots & lines of communication whose threatened by the rebels and in reply to state that the Paymaster General has been ordered
to pay these troops for the time they were actually in service.

Very respectfully
Louis H. Pelonze.
Asst Adjt Genl

Order
To pay 68th Militia.
original sent to Washington
Mch 31st 1871
